clinical_history: Patient with thyroid nodule under assessment.
findings: Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in thyroid, suggestive of malignancy.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in thyroid with SUVmax 12.28.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
